<h3 id="X38052">X(38052) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(7), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38052) = X(1)-4*X(142) = X(1)+2*X(2550) = 2*X(4)+X(2951) = 4*X(5)-X(11372) = X(7)+2*X(10) = 2*X(7)+X(5223) = X(8)+2*X(5542) = 2*X(9)-5*X(1698) = X(9)-4*X(3826) = 2*X(9)+X(4312) = X(9)+2*X(5880) = 4*X(10)-X(5223) = 2*X(142)+X(2550) = 5*X(1698)-8*X(3826) = 5*X(1698)+X(4312) = 5*X(1698)+4*X(5880) = X(5290)+2*X(5833) = 3*X(7988)-X(24644) = 3*X(7988)-2*X(38037) = X(38059)-3*X(38204)</b>

<p>
X(38052) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {7, 5686}, {2550, 38053}, {6173, 38200}, {21151, 38149}, {38054, 38201}, {38107, 38121}, {38111, 38170}<br>
X(38052) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 38053), (2, 38204), (1699, 38150), (3576, 38122), (3679, 38200), (5223, 5686), (5686, 10), (5817, 10175), (5886, 38171), (8236, 551), (11038, 38054), (16173, 38205), (16475, 38186), (21151, 38123), (21168, 38130), (24644, 38037), (25055, 38093), (37701, 38206), (38030, 38111), (38036, 38107), (38053, 142), (38107, 38172)<br>
X(38052) = anticomplement of X(38059)<br>
X(38052) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(5686)<br>
X(38052) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (7, 10, 5223), (9, 3826, 1698), (9, 5880, 4312), (142, 2550, 1), (226, 26040, 8580), (1001, 20195, 3624), (1698, 4312, 9), (3008, 4307, 16469), (3306, 33108, 5231), (3755, 4648, 1), (3826, 5880, 9), (4208, 11024, 10), (5177, 8582, 7989), (7988, 24644, 38037), (8732, 12573, 3361), (11038, 38054, 38024), (24154, 24155, 3946), (38092, 38094, 38024), (38094, 38201, 38054), (38121, 38172, 38036), (38202, 38203, 38170)<br>
</p>
